item.title: 【Helpdesk】OFFERING APPLE MUSIC MVs
item.description:
hello everyone, i finally have a lot of free time and i wanted to help users with their apple music mv requests!
it doesn't matter how many links you send, i will complete all requests no matter how much it is.

all you have to do is send me a list of apple music links like this:

https://music.apple.com/us/music-video/chun-li/1380529809
https://music.apple.com/us/music-video/ganja-burn/1425998218
https://music.apple.com/us/music-video/rake-it-up-feat-nicki-minaj/1274617514

or if you want all music videos of artists send me links like this:

https://music.apple.com/us/artist/enhypen/1541011620/see-all?section=music-videos
https://music.apple.com/us/artist/le-sserafim/1616740364
https://music.apple.com/us/artist/ive/1594159996

you can message me on:
sharemania DM
discord (request server): https://discord.gg/Gvb6dJapBk

also make sure your music video is available on the United States storefront, otherwise i won't able to rip it
item.author: stargamer
